input.sentences: i was ready to try the recipe .
the dough came first and looked like it came out perfect .
it began to rise just like it was supposed to .
we cooked some soup to dip the seitan in after it was finished .
the other batch i made did not look as good as the first .
output.sentences: Jane looked for a recipe because she wanted to cook for her mother.
She made bread and rolled it into a ball.
She found a warm place for it to rise.
Meanwhile, she made a tasty soup.
Sadly, when she went back to the bread, it had fallen flat.
